12#pragma once
13
14#if HAVE_STDATOMIC_H
15#include <stdatomic.h>
16#else
17#include <isc/stdatomic.h>
18#endif
19
20/*
21 * We define a few additional macros to make things easier
22 */
23
24#define atomic_store_relaxed(o, v) atomic_store_explicit((o), \
25 (v), \
26 memory_order_relaxed)
27#define atomic_load_relaxed(o) atomic_load_explicit((o), memory_order_relaxed)
28
